1572480.name: Through The Fragmentation Demo
1572480.description:
"Have you ever really tried to escape from here? This place feels like a strange prison and it actually is, believe me. There must be an exit somewhere..."

Through The Fragmentation is a first person aventure game focusing on non-linear exploration. You can talk to the many strange inhabitants of the City, discover hidden areas and secrets, or just try to piece together the mystery of the Fragmentation - it's up to you. Tasks can be solved in different ways, but the demo has only one ending.

This version is identical to the demo published on GameJolt and Itch.io.

NOTE: Players can experience framerate issues on low-end computers. Also, the demo runs in native resolution.
